title: Womens Maxi Dress

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater looks cute. However, the sizing receives negative feedback, with multiple customers noting that the sleeves are extremely oversized and baggy.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your time
items.body: Very disappointed. It looks so cute in the picture. I bought an XS because that's what I wear but it's HUGE on me. I look like a clown. And the sleeves are so awkward looking. In the picture she is hiding how much fabric there is. There is tons of extra fabric just hanging that looks so weird. Only positives, it is soft, colors look nice. Looked awful on me though. Wouldn't recommend. Read more
items.author: Kairoem

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater!
items.body: Such a cute sweater! Super comfortable, fits a tad big so size down I’d say! Read more
items.author: Alexandra

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars MERRY
items.body: Runs BIG. Otherwise, great! Read more
items.author: kb

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too oversized
items.body: The colors are beautiful and the detail on the sleeves is very nice. But the sweater is extremely oversized compared to what I wanted. I don't like the neckline either, it makes the whole sweater look stretched out Read more
items.author: Alejandra Hernández Barazarte

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Oversized pullover!
items.body: Know before you buy, u want go down 2size! Runs Really really big. Im a size L and got an M, but it was still too big. Its beautiful though! Read more
items.author: Maggy

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way too big
items.body: This sweater could be perfect but it is WAY TOO OVER SIZED! The color and quality was better than expected. I wear a large in almost everything but read the reviews so I ordered a medium. It was about 3 times too big so I am returning it. It’s unfortunate because it was really cute. I’m not even sure an x-small would fit me. Read more
items.author: T Penn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs Big
items.body: The shirt is cute and is good quality however, the large that I normally wear was too big I had to re-order a Med. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t like
items.body: Reviews are accurate. The sweater runs big. I am a size large. Ordered a small and it is too big. The sweater also arrived an overall different color than shown in the picture. I do not like. Read more
items.author: Destiny Wood

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-black, B-black, A-blackish Green, B-apricot, B-green, A-red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
